rows.label: bf07110150_0010
rows.name: What IS this?

rows.label: bf07110150_0020
rows.name: This is Genbu's ether flow.

rows.label: bf07110150_0030
rows.name:
The Divine Beast ingests the Cloud
Sea and uses it as a source of energy.

rows.label: bf07110150_0040
rows.name:
This energy flows throughout
the Divine Beast's body in the form of ether.

rows.label: bf07110150_0050
rows.name:
Refining and crystallizing this ether creates
Core Chips.

rows.label: bf07110150_0060
rows.name: This process is what you see before you.

rows.label: bf07110150_0070
rows.name:
So in other words, you're siphoning
away a portion of the Divine Beast's energy.

rows.label: bf07110150_0080
rows.name:
Our cold climate and poor harvests -
they are the unfortunate side effects of this process.

rows.label: bf07110150_0090
rows.name: I think I'm beginning to understand...

rows.label: bf07110150_0100
rows.name:
Core Chips are vital to every nation's
military and energy policies.

rows.label: bf07110150_0110
rows.name: The Holy See desired this power.

rows.label: bf07110150_0120
rows.name: How come?

rows.label: bf07110150_0130
rows.name: Alst at the time was in crisis.

rows.label: bf07110150_0140
rows.name:
But for the Holy See, it was a precious chance
to expand their sphere of influence.

rows.label: bf07110150_0150
rows.name: So they...muscled in.

rows.label: bf07110150_0160
rows.name:
As a result, Luxuria fell into a
chronic energy shortage.

rows.label: bf07110150_0170
rows.name: Then... Well, you saw for yourselves.

rows.label: bf07110150_0180
rows.name: Near-frozen earth. Failing crops.

rows.label: bf07110150_0190
rows.name:
The Luxurian people are forced to
live in abject poverty.

rows.label: bf07110150_0200
rows.name: So why not just leave the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: bf07110150_0210
rows.name:
Genbu can move, right?
Just go somewhere warmer.

rows.label: bf07110150_0220
rows.name: They fear contact with other nations.

rows.label: bf07110150_0230
rows.name:
Too afraid it might expose the truth behind
the legends they spun about Adel.

rows.label: bf07110150_0240
rows.name: That would explain their isolationism.

rows.label: bf07110150_0250
rows.name: Indeed. That was five centuries ago.

rows.label: bf07110150_0260
rows.name:
Now the Holy Grail has awakened, the Holy See
is demanding we hand over the Sanctus Chain.

rows.label: bf07110150_0270
rows.name:
They are threatening to reveal our secret if
we do not acquiesce.

rows.label: bf07110150_0280
rows.name: Acedia are threatening you?!

rows.label: bf07110150_0290
rows.name:
I get it now.
That's what was in that letter.

rows.label: bf07110150_0300
rows.name: Enough was enough!

rows.label: bf07110150_0310
rows.name:
I couldn't stand by and let the Luxurian people
suffer any longer.

rows.label: bf07110150_0320
rows.name: Therefore, I made a decision.

rows.label: bf07110150_0330
rows.name: And that's why you-

rows.label: bf07110150_0340
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf07110150_0350
rows.name:
I knew there was a chance that the Holy See
would use the Holy Grail against us.

rows.label: bf07110150_0360
rows.name:
But if I could neutralize her power, perhaps
we would stand a chance of opposing them.

rows.label: bf07110150_0370
rows.name:
And perhaps by saving my people from poverty, I
could absolve the sins of my forefathers.

rows.label: bf07110150_0380
rows.name:
You didn't think about using the Holy Grail's
power yourself?

rows.label: bf07110150_0390
rows.name: Wielding such power is beyond my means.

rows.label: bf07110150_0400
rows.name: I know very well that we lack the qualification.

rows.label: bf07110150_0410
rows.name: However, does the same apply to you?

rows.label: bf07110150_0420
rows.name: I felt something. When I looked in your eyes, I knew.

rows.label: bf07110150_0430
rows.name:
Perhaps you are the one to whom we
can entrust the Holy Grail's power.

rows.label: bf07110150_0440
rows.name: Father...

rows.label: bf07110150_0450
rows.name:
In the end it seems I only managed
to make things worse.

rows.label: bf07110150_0460
rows.name: I can blame nothing but my own judgment.

rows.label: bf07110150_0470
rows.name: This tome records the deeds of the hero Adel.

rows.label: bf07110150_0480
rows.name:
According to this, he saved the world
from destruction using a white sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0490
rows.name: And then disappeared, along with a red sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0500
rows.name: White and red...

rows.label: bf07110150_0505
rows.name: It must mean Hikari and Homura's swords.

rows.label: bf07110150_0510
rows.name:
Whoever wrote this must have
had a personal connection to Adel.

rows.label: bf07110150_0520
rows.name: And most curiously...

rows.label: bf07110150_0530
rows.name:
After Adel disappeared, the author of this
book went looking for something.

rows.label: bf07110150_0540
rows.name: Something?

rows.label: bf07110150_0550
rows.name: The third Holy Grail sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0560
rows.name: There's a third?

rows.label: bf07110150_0570
rows.name:
Apparently this sword was as transparent as
diamond, and gave off a clear, brilliant light.

rows.label: bf07110150_0580
rows.name:
But Adel went his whole life without
using the sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0590
rows.name: In fact, he could not use it.

rows.label: bf07110150_0600
rows.name: What do you mean, 'couldn't'?

rows.label: bf07110150_0610
rows.name: The sword was simply too powerful.

rows.label: bf07110150_0620
rows.name:
Even he, the legendary hero, could
not contain the power it commanded.

rows.label: bf07110150_0630
rows.name:
And thus, fearing its power,
he sealed it away somewhere.

rows.label: bf07110150_0640
rows.name: The author therefore surmised...

rows.label: bf07110150_0650
rows.name:
...that this sword alone was the
one true sword of the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf07110150_0660
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?!

rows.label: bf07110150_0670
rows.name:
Now, Rex. You were defeated by Shin.
Doubtless that man is a powerful warrior...

rows.label: bf07110150_0680
rows.name: But even so, can this be right?

rows.label: bf07110150_0690
rows.name:
Can the Holy Grail herself truly be
outmatched by a single opposing Blade?

rows.label: bf07110150_0700
rows.name: Would it not make more sense to presume...

rows.label: bf07110150_0710
rows.name:
...that you lost because you have yet to unlock
the true power of the Holy Grail?

rows.label: bf07110150_0720
rows.name: You mean...I'm the one who's been holding them back...?

rows.label: bf07110150_0730
rows.name: Your Majesty! Where is that sword?

rows.label: bf07110150_0740
rows.name: I want to get my hands on that sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0750
rows.name: To rescue Homura and Hikari!

rows.label: bf07110150_0760
rows.name:
Regrettably, the book does not specify
the sword's location.

rows.label: bf07110150_0770
rows.name: But there must be...

rows.label: bf07110150_0780
rows.name:
However, reading between the lines,
it seems the author suspected...

rows.label: bf07110150_0790
rows.name: ...that the sword lies somewhere in Liberalitas.

rows.label: bf07110150_0800
rows.name:
It's not much, but that's where I would
begin the search.

rows.label: bf07110150_0810
rows.name: In Liberalitas...

rows.label: bf07110150_0820
rows.name: Are you ready?

rows.label: bf07110150_0830
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf07110150_0840
rows.name:
Are you ready to do what it takes
to be their true Driver?

rows.label: bf07110150_0860
rows.name: Gramps?

rows.label: bf07110150_0870
rows.name: Well? Are you, Rex?

rows.label: bf07110150_0880
rows.name: Yes! Of course!

rows.label: bf07110150_0890
rows.name:
I'm going to be the Driver that Homura
and Hikari deserve!

rows.label: bf07110150_0900
rows.name: And then I'm going to take them to Eden!

rows.label: bf07110150_0910
rows.name:
Then come with me.
I'll show you the way.

rows.label: bf07110150_0920
rows.name: My son.

rows.label: bf07110150_0930
rows.name: Yeah?

rows.label: bf07110150_0940
rows.name: I have a favor, to ask of you as your king.

rows.label: bf07110150_0950
rows.name:
Well that's a first.
Are you feeling okay, old man?

rows.label: bf07110150_0960
rows.name: Maybe you're coming down with something.

rows.label: bf07110150_0970
rows.name: The Holy Grail needs...

rows.label: bf07110150_0980
rows.name: No, rather, the boy needs protection.

rows.label: bf07110150_0990
rows.name: You mean Rex?

rows.label: bf07110150_1000
rows.name: Yes. I saw...something, in that boy's eyes.

rows.label: bf07110150_1010
rows.name: A light that must...never go out.

rows.label: bf07110150_1020
rows.name:
Heh. Steady on, old man.
People will get the wrong idea.

rows.label: bf07110150_1030
rows.name: ...Fine. Leave it to me.

rows.label: bf07110150_1040
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: bf07110150_1050
rows.name: Meh, it's not like I wasn't gonna go with him anyway.
